Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students trying to communicate over a long distance.
The student can include a device in the drawing, like a string telephone, that helps the students communicate using sound.
The student can show or label how the device works using sound for communication.
The student can illustrate that the designed device is able to send and receive information between the two students.
The student can identify the materials used in the drawing that are necessary to build the communication device.
The student can demonstrate how the communication device solves the problem of speaking over a distance.
The student can describe visually or in writing the importance of communicating over long distances using the device shown in their drawing.
